spec_data.Name: perl-Email-MIME-Encodings
spec_data.Description:
This module simply wraps "MIME::Base64" and "MIME::QuotedPrint" so that
you can throw the contents of a "Content-Transfer-Encoding" header at
some text and have the right thing happen.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:08:03 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Unified interface to MIME encoding and decoding
